description: Magical snowy Christmas village with festive enemies and the Evil Santa boss
wikiDescription: Frohe Weihnachten! Erkunde ein verschneites Weihnachtsdorf und besiege den bösen Weihnachtsmann, der die Geschenke gestohlen hat.
mechanic: Gift collection - collect presents scattered around the village to unlock the portal. When a present is collected, it spawns a circle of useful items around it (ammo, bombs, herzmen turrets). More presents = more supplies for the boss fight. DANGER: Some presents are decoys wrapped in darker paper - they explode when collected, dealing 1 damage to the player!

newEntities.name: Böser Elf
newEntities.description: Ein bösartiger Elf in rot-grüner Kleidung mit spitzen Ohren. Einst ein Helfer des Weihnachtsmanns, jetzt vom bösen Santa verdorben.

newEntities.name: Böser Weihnachtsmann
newEntities.description: Der böse Weihnachtsmann auf seinem fliegenden Schlitten! Fliegt durch die Luft und wirft explodierende Geschenke herab. Ruft böse Elfen herbei.

wizard.note: Walking Evil Santa - red coat, white beard, no sledge, walks on ground

specialMechanic.name: Christmas Present Collection
specialMechanic.description: Collect wrapped presents scattered around the village to get random rewards. Beware of decoy presents that explode when touched!

collectibles.appearance: Colorful wrapped gift boxes with golden ribbons and bow

hazards.appearance: Dark colored presents with black ribbons and subtle red glow

bossProjectile.appearance: Tumbling wrapped gift that explodes on impact
